agent_purpose: Generates professional sales presentation decks (PPTX) based on client context and deal information. Returns an array of slide objects with structured content for each slide.
description: Returns an array of slide objects. Each slide contains slide_number, slide_title, bullet_points (array of strings), speaker_notes, and metadata fields (presentation_type, client_name, industry_vertical, key_pain_points, products_to_highlight, tone). The subtitle field is optional and appears only on the title slide.

result.slide_title: Acme Corp: Powering Innovation with Modern Technology
result.subtitle: Transforming Legacy Challenges into Digital Opportunities
result.speaker_notes: Good morning/afternoon, Acme Corp team. I'm [Your Name], and I'm excited to present how we can help you overcome your current challenges...

result.slide_title: Agenda: Charting a Course for Digital Transformation
result.speaker_notes: To begin, let's review our agenda...

test_message_used: Generate a professional intro pitch presentation for Acme Corp, a Technology company. Key pain points: Legacy systems causing downtime, High operational costs, Need for digital transformation. Products to highlight: CloudSync Platform, AI Analytics Suite. Tone: Professional. Number of slides: 8.
response_format_notes: This agent returns an ARRAY of slide objects directly (not wrapped in standard {status, result, metadata}). The response from test_agent_response returns the array as the top-level result. Each slide has consistent fields. The subtitle field is only present on the title slide. bullet_points may be empty on the title slide. No artifact_files or PPTX download URLs were returned - the agent produces structured slide content data. The UI should iterate over the array to render a slide-by-slide view.
